say.name: GUARD:
say.says: Hey! You're finally awake. So I guess today is the day huh?

say.name: YOU:
say.says: I'm not sure. I don't feel much of anything honestly.

say.name: GAURD:
say.says: Well hopefully that changes. You get your life back today! What do you think you'll do?

say.name: YOU:
say.says: I think I'm going home to find my daughter...
